ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans('Page cannot be less than 1 and greater than Max Page')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select :5 COUNT(DocEntry) from OCRD T0 WITH (NOLOCK) join OCRG T1 (nolock) on T0.GroupCode=T1.GroupCode WHERE T0.ValidFor = 'Y' :1 :2 :3 :4

ExpSyntax.val: IF(ISNULL({0,54}) OR Trim({0,54}) = '', '', ' and (T0.CardCode like ''%' & Trim({0,54}) & '%'') ')
IF(ISNULL({0,9}) OR Trim({0,9}) = '', '', ' and (T0.CardName like ''%' & Trim({0,9}) & '%'') ')
IF(ISNULL({0,2}) OR Trim({0,2}) = '', '', ' and (T0.CardType = '& ASCIIChr(39) & Trim({0,2}) & ASCIIChr(39) &') ')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select :5 T0.CardCode as 'BP Number', T0.CardName as 'BP Name', T0.CardType as 'BP Type', T1.GroupName as 'BP Group', CASE WHEN T0.Currency = '##' Then 'All Currency' Else T0.Currency END AS 'Currency', T0.Cellular as 'Mobile Phone', T0.DocEntry as 'Doc Entry', replace(replace(replace(T0.Address,char(13),' '),char(10),''),char(9),'') as [Address], concat(trim(A1.AcctCode), ' - ', trim(A1.AcctName)) as DebPayAcctName, concat(trim(A2.AcctCode), ' - ', trim(A2.AcctName)) as DpmClearAcctName, T0.VendorOCUP as DHCode from OCRD T0 WITH (NOLOCK) join OCRG T1 (nolock) on T0.GroupCode=T1.GroupCode left join OACT A1 (NOLOCK) on T0.DebPayAcct = A1.AcctCode left join OACT A2 (NOLOCK) on T0.DpmClear = A2.AcctCode WHERE T0.CardCode >= :6 and T0.CardCode <= :7 :1 :2 :3 :4 :8

ExpSyntax.val: DataViewToText(0,'BP Number,BP Name,BP Type,BP Group, Currency,Mobile Phone,Address','BP Number,BP Name,BP Type,BP Group, Currency,Mobile Phone,Address',{32768,84},';','',0)

DataViewToText( 0, 'BP Number,BP Name,BP Type,BP Group,Currency,Mobile Phone,Address,DebPayAcctName,DpmClearAcctName', MlsTrans('BP Number,BP Name,BP Type,BP Group,Currency,Mobile Phone,Address,BP Account,Downpayment Account'), Trim({32768,84}), ';', '', 0 )
IF(ISNULL({0,54}) OR Trim({0,54}) = '', '', ' and (T0.CardCode like ''%' & Trim({0,54}) & '%'') ')
IF(ISNULL({0,9}) OR Trim({0,9}) = '', '', ' and (T0.CardName like ''%' & Trim({0,9}) & '%'') ')
IF(ISNULL({0,2}) OR Trim({0,2}) = '', '', ' and (T0.CardType = '& ASCIIChr(39) & Trim({0,2}) & ASCIIChr(39) &') ')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select :5 T0.CardCode as 'BP Number', T0.CardName as 'BP Name', T0.CardType as 'BP Type', T1.GroupName as 'BP Group', CASE WHEN T0.Currency = '##' Then 'All Currency' Else T0.Currency END AS 'Currency', T0.Cellular as 'Mobile Phone', T0.DocEntry as 'Doc Entry', replace(replace(replace(T0.Address,char(13),' '),char(10),''),char(9),'') as [Address], concat(trim(A1.AcctCode), ' - ', trim(A1.AcctName)) as DebPayAcctName, concat(trim(A2.AcctCode), ' - ', trim(A2.AcctName)) as DpmClearAcctName, T0.VendorOCUP as DHCode from OCRD T0 WITH (NOLOCK) join OCRG T1 (nolock) on T0.GroupCode=T1.GroupCode left join OACT A1 (NOLOCK) on T0.DebPayAcct = A1.AcctCode left join OACT A2 (NOLOCK) on T0.DpmClear = A2.AcctCode WHERE T0.ValidFor =:6 :1 :2 :3 :4

ExpSyntax.val: DataViewToText(0,'BP Number,BP Name,BP Type,BP Group, Currency,Mobile Phone,Address','BP Number,BP Name,BP Type,BP Group, Currency,Mobile Phone,Address',{32768,84},';','',0)

DataViewToText( 0, 'BP Number'&IF(Trim({32768,118})<>'RS', '', ',DHCode')&',BP Name,BP Type,BP Group,Currency,Mobile Phone,Address,DebPayAcctName,DpmClearAcctName', IF(Trim({32768,118})<>'RS', MlsTrans('BP Number,BP Name,BP Type,BP Group,Currency,Mobile Phone,Address,BP Account,Downpayment Account'), MlsTrans('BP Number,DH Code,BP Name,BP Type,BP Group,Currency,Mobile Phone,Address,BP Account,Downpayment Account') ), Trim({32768,84}), ';', '', 0 )
IF(ISNULL({0,54}) OR Trim({0,54}) = '', '', ' and (T0.CardCode like ''%' & Trim({0,54}) & '%'') ')
IF(ISNULL({0,9}) OR Trim({0,9}) = '', '', ' and (T0.CardName like ''%' & Trim({0,9}) & '%'') ')
IF(ISNULL({0,2}) OR Trim({0,2}) = '', '', ' and (T0.CardType = '& ASCIIChr(39) & Trim({0,2}) & ASCIIChr(39) &') ')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select MinID, MaxID, MaxGroup as MaxPage from ( select GroupNum, MIN(CardCode) as MinID, MAX(CardCode) as MaxID, MAX(GroupNum) OVER() as MaxGroup from ( select CAST( CEILING( (ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY T0.CardCode ASC)) / cast(:5 as DECIMAL(8, 3) ) ) as int ) as GroupNum, T0.CardCode from OCRD T0 WITH (NOLOCK) join OCRG T1 (nolock) on T0.GroupCode=T1.GroupCode WHERE T0.ValidFor = :7 :1 :2 :3 :4 )T2 group by GroupNum ) T where GroupNum = :6

ExpSyntax.val: IF(ISNULL({0,54}) OR Trim({0,54}) = '', '', ' and (T0.CardCode like ''%' & Trim({0,54}) & '%'') ')
IF(ISNULL({0,9}) OR Trim({0,9}) = '', '', ' and (T0.CardName like ''%' & Trim({0,9}) & '%'') ')
IF(ISNULL({0,2}) OR Trim({0,2}) = '', '', ' and (T0.CardType = '& ASCIIChr(39) & Trim({0,2}) & ASCIIChr(39) &') ')
